stories.title: Showcase AI/ML Projects with Impressive Presentations
stories.description: Update the portfolio projects section with recent work from Code and ML Projects directories. Each project should create a 'wow moment' for hirers with compelling taglines and clear impact metrics.

stories.title: Add Project Detail Pages
stories.description: Create individual project detail pages with full descriptions, tech stack, architecture diagrams, and demo links.

stories.title: Add Case Studies Section
stories.description: Add in-depth case studies for top 3 projects showing problem-solution-impact format.

stories.title: Add Live Demos/Screenshots
stories.description: Add visual assets - screenshots, demo videos, or live embeds for each project.

projectsToShowcase.name: VisionSathi
projectsToShowcase.impact: Offline-first AI assistant for blind users using on-device Moondream 3

projectsToShowcase.name: LiveAvatar
projectsToShowcase.impact: 14B parameter real-time avatar generation, 1000+ GitHub stars

projectsToShowcase.name: Aya Knowledge Base
projectsToShowcase.impact: Zero-hallucination RAG system with 333+ tests, OWASP-compliant

projectsToShowcase.name: Sarathi Voice Agent
projectsToShowcase.impact: Multilingual govt voice assistant for NE India (Assamese/Bodo)

projectsToShowcase.name: UIDAI Analytics
projectsToShowcase.impact: National-scale identity analytics platform for 1.4B citizens
